OriginalText: Nooo! You wait 'til the Fatherland hears of this behaviour!
Hello little Britishers... Mama is here to rocket you to sleep!
Mama has got to fly, but she'll be back, and you'll be sorry.
Time to go, but Mother's Day is coming!
The Fatherland is hard at work, so Mama will take care of you!
I have let you stay up late. But now it's time to put you down.
Your flights of fancy are so sweet. But Mama will bring you back to earth...
Stop crying and take your medicine!
You have made your mother very angry!
Ah, here you are, my little ones - are you ready for your medicine?
Well, this sucks...
Ah-hah, some new blood! At last, something to get my teeth into...
You know, you're a real pain in the neck - time to fly!
On reflection, it's best if I disappear.
I strike from the shadows! Ha-HAH!
You are a pawn, but I - I am the night!
It is time to raise the stakes!
Listen to the twin MK 108 cannons! What beautiful music they make!
I am silent, and I am deadly!
Ah-hah-HAH! On the wings of the night, I come to you!
Mutti was right: nice guys finish last! Farewell, cruel world!
Halt! I have orders to stop you - by any means!
Bullets are bad for my health! I'm getting out of here!

Help me, Mutti! The big bombers are being nasty to me!
Argh, my vertigo is kicking in! I need a lie down...
Prepare to learn some manners, brutes!
Ach! Stop shooting at me, you vandals!
You are forcing my hand! Stop making me shoot you!
Fine! You ignore my warnings, now pay the price!
I asked you to stop, but would you listen? NO!
I went easy on you last time... Not any more!
For the first time, Gunnar tastes bitter defeat! Damn you!
Once Gunnar has you in his sights, you fly on borrowed time!
Hmm, you force Gunnar to return to base. Until next time, fools!
A lucky shot, damn your eyes! I depart, but we will duel again!
Bombs for show, cowl-mounted 7.92mm MG17 machine guns for a pro!
Your lack of precision is laughable!
Time to take you to school... Your final lesson begins now!
You call this a fight? Gott in Himmel, are you even trying?
Stop waving your rudder and SHOOT me!

Some fools never learn... Do not fear, I will end this quickly.
Well, who is this in my sights again? Prepare for execution!

Ach! My flame may be extinguished but my legend lives on!
NOOO!

Some like it hot... So let's see how you enjoy my inferno!
Prepare to feel my heat, fools!
My flame still burns! You've not seen the last of me!
Curses! I'm feeling a little put out, but I'll be back!
The only things hotter than me are my guns!

How's THIS for a warm-up?
Things are about to get HEATED!

Am I making you hot under the collar?
Let me fan the flames of your demise!

You are but apprentices - and you're fired!
I will slice through you like a hot knife through butter!

Now witness my blaze of glory!
Your fairytale will soon be over, Cinders!

Come gather round my fire, idiots!
Defeat me? I will make a bonfire of your vanity!

Now you understand, fools: I am too hot to handle!
You play with fire, you get burned!

Prepare to feel the burn once more, scum!
Back for more? Let me tell you the story of Icarus...
And so the hunter becomes the hunted! Clever girl...

Prepare to face the apex predator of the skies!
Fight or flight, you die tonight!

Huh, you nearly impressed me... I will not underestimate you again!
So, the sheep repels the wolf... You will not be so lucky next time!
Ha, the cub thinks it is a lion! This hunt is not over - I will return!
Death from above! Death from below! Death from wherever I damn-well go!

Cower before me, prey!
Your heads will take pride of place in my trophy room!
This shark tastes blood and closes in for the kill!

First blood is mine!
Ha, you are winged! Now to take you to ground!
Hunt high, hunt low - none shall escape the deathblow!

Your hide may be thick, but your underbelly is soft!
Run, rabbit, run from my gun, gun, GUN!

I have tasted my own medicine, and it is divine!
I go down in a blaze of glory! REMEMBER ME!

I, Kaspar, will start this party with a BANG!
The sky shakes and the earth quakes for - yes! - Kaspar is here!

You have been lucky this time, but luck runs out eventuallyâ€¦
Ach, out of ammo! But I'll return soon - Kaspar leaves no job unfinished!

Kaspar's boom is a bust! But only for now...
Huh, Kaspar retreats to rethink his big BANG theory...
Do you hear that boom? It's your impending DOOM!

Think explosions are bad? Ha - wait until you hit the ground!
Kaspar will rain mainly on your plane - a rain of DEATH!

Hail King Kaspar and his benevolent rain - of BULLETS!
Today's forecast: Cloudy with a chance of exploding bombers! Ha-ha-ha!

I plan to give you a BANGING headache!
Thunderbolts and lightning, Kaspar is the flight king!
I will light the sky with your flaming remains!

You are about to go out with a BANG!
Prepare to rest in pieces, dolts!
H-how could a bumbling bomber best my beautiful fighter! THIS IS AN OUTRAGE!

Ha, I have you in my sights! Consider that an honour!
I will catch you in my web of fear, lumbering louts!
So, little David's aim was true. This Goliath is no fool: we shall meet again!
I flee to lick my wounds. But I will return, with rage in my heart and fire in my guns.
You have earned my respect, but that does not mean I will spare you in future.
I am QUEEN of the skies, while you are but an insignificant PAWN. Prepare for CHECKMATE!

The bigger they are, the harder they hit!
You think this a fight, insect? It is an extermination!

Quiet, little one: I will make your death as painless as possible!
In the sky there is nowhere to hide - I see all!

Why struggle so? We both know how this ends for you!
One must soften the meat before devouring it!

I will crush your puny bomber! Do you hear me!?
My guns will tear you apart, no matter where you hide!

We meet again... No-one makes a fool of me and lives!
So I face you again... High command must consider you important!
Nein, I am done for! I lived fast and died faster!

Ha, this will be like taking strudel from a stormtrooper!
You're about as tough as mouldy sauerkraut!

Heh, not bad, not bad at all... But I will return before you know it!
You won this round, but the fight is not over until die grosse Frau sings!
We will meet again... And next time I will send you down!
Why so slow? Did someone coat your wings in treacle?

Don't blink or you'll miss me!
I feel the need... the need to make you BLEED!

You can't shoot what you can't see!
Slow and steady wins last place!

This is no time for a Sunday stroll, indolent fools!
Ha - and they say lightning doesn't strike twice!
It's like the tortoise and the hare - except this hare has machine guns!

Not even your imminent deaths can hurry you up!
Accelerate, or meet your fate!
Ah, it's you! Is it my imagination or are you even slower than before!?

Aaaiiee! Your fighting spirit is unstoppable! I deem you... worthy...
No! NO! This CANNOT be happening! I am the thunder! I am the storm! I am--

Hail to the Kaiser! Now witness your own doom!
Feel the wrath of a thunder god!

At last: a worthy adversary! But this does not end here - I shall return!
You buy a moment's peace, but it is merely the calm before the storm!

Now, my most secret move: "How to keep doomed fools in suspense"!
This is not a victory, just a brief moment of respite before inevitable doom!
History is written by the victors - and you have already been forgotten! Sad!

I come with the thunder, I come with the storm!
I will make you wish you'd never been born!

Have you ever faced death before? For here I am!
Flee before my storm, lest it blows you apart!

Die, you fools!
You have met your expiry date!

For you, it's the most important day of your life. For me? Just another Tuesday!
The fury of my storm will never be abated!

Give me the fight I crave! Harder! HARDER!
I am your personal extinction-level event!

No retreat, no surrender! You will die this day!
Death comes for you, on wings of lightning

Fritz: Time for us to double-down...
Franz: Alas! Two birds with one stone...

Fritz: Seems we have company, Franz?
Franz: Two's company, this is a crowd. Blow them to bits, Fritz!

Franz: I'm doubled-up in pain...
Fritz: You're right, my brother. Time to split.

Franz: I'm seeing double! Let us fly!
Fritz: Once bitten, twice shy!

Fritz: It takes two to tango...
Franz: But we're here to Foxtrot, Uniform!

Fritz: They say who dares, wins...
Franz: But who dares twins?

Franz: Now it's time to take you off the board...
Fritz: Two can play at this game!

Franz: Let's give 'em the old one-two!
Fritz: Time for a double-whammy!

Franz: We'll teach you a thing or two!
Fritz: That's right! We'll make you think twice!

Fritz: Our guests return, Franz!
Franz: What do you say? Double-or-quits, Fritz?
Enemy Ace defeated!
Enemy Ace escaping!
Enemy Ace spotted!
Engaging Enemy Ace!

Recon target added to map!
Optional recon opportunity spotted!
Survivors spotted! Added to map!

Approaching {0} now!
{0} ahead!
Hydraulics out- bomb doors non-operational!
Bombing target destroyed!
Bay doors open!
Ready to release bombload!
Bomb target confirmed!
Cancelling abort order! Continuing mission.
Oxygen supply depleted!
I urgently require oxygen!
Freezing temperatures starting to be a problem!
Entering freezing conditions!
It's getting very cold up here...
I'm starting to notice the cold a lot.
I can't survive the cold much longer!
We've taken a lot of damage!
We've taken critical damage!
The bomber's barely holding together!
Bailing out!
Bailing!
Fire extinguisher depleted!
Enemy fighter shot down!
Enemy destroyed!
Enemy Ace pilot taken down!
We've defeated an Enemy Ace!
Enemy Ace destroyed!
Good shooting, {1}!
Nice shot, {1}!
V1 Rocket Destroyed!
V1 Rocket shot down!
V2 Rocket Destroyed!
V2 Rocket shot down!
Enemy fighters spotted on radar!
Something is burning...
Looks like something might catch fire...
Critical fire in the bomber!
Flak ahead below us!
Flak below our altitude!
Flak ahead at low altitude.
Approaching low altitude flak!
Flak ahead at mid altitude!
Approaching mid altitude flak!
We're low on fuel!
We're using up fuel fast!
We're out of fuel!
A fuel tank is leaking!
Half our fuel remaining!
Picked up ammo! Back to station!
Got ammo, returning to station!
Picked up ammo, waiting for further orders.
Collected ammo, waiting at ammo box.
Targets on radar at sea or ground level!
Fighter target confirmed!
Hydraulics out- unable to aim turrets!
Running low on ammo!
I'm out of ammo.
All ammo belts used.
My gun's ammo feed is stuck!
Ammo jammed on my gun!
Recovered from injuries!
I'm healed!
Recovered from injuries! Returning to station!
Recovered, returning to station!
{1} needs medical attention!
I'm down! Requesting assistance!
Altitude too high to land!
Hydraulics out- landing gear non-operational!
Retrying landing approach! Gear must be lowered!
Medical assistance required!
I'm heavily injured!
We're getting reports that an enemy ace pilot, {0} {1}, is active in the area!
We're getting reports that the enemy ace twins, {0} {1}, are active in the area!
Navigation's difficult through this cloud!
Cloud cover making it difficult to navigate!
I've marked a new heading!
New course plotted!
Custom marker placed!
No visibility for navigation at this altitude!
I need a navigation update!
Navigation update required!
New intel received! Adding to map!
We've lost all our engines!
None of our engines are left!
No new intel received at this time!
There's nobody in the pilot's seat!
No pilot!
Only one engine remaining!
We've got one engine left!
Everyone bail out!
Bail out!
Going past {0} now!
We are passing {0}!
Photo is too blurry! Suggest lower altitude!
Photo too blurry at this altitude!
Intel photograph taken!
Nothing spotted in photo...
Starting bomb run!
Commencing bomb run!
Adjusting heading!
Heading confirmed!
Adjusting heading...
Hold on chaps!
Brace for manoeuvre!
Electrics have failed! The radar is out!
We've been spotted on enemy radar!
Spotted by enemy radar!
We're in range of a radar site!
Within range of enemy radar.
Reached high altitude!
Reached low altitude!
Reached mid altitude!
Repair complete!
Aborting mission! Returning to base.
Returning to base!
That was a piece of cake!
That went better than expected!
Back home safe!
Objectives complete! Returning to base!
{0} ready to use!
{0} recharged!
Emergency landing!
Target is submerging!
Submarine is diving!
A submarine is preparing to fire a torpedo!
I'm taking fire!
Altitude too low for corkscrew!
Altitude too low for emergency dive!
We've only got two engines left!
Only two engines working, now!
A V1 rocket's just launched!
They're preparing to launch a V1 rocket!
Spitfire fighters reporting in!
Enemy fighter destroyed!
Fighter shot down!
Returning to base!
Spitfire Leader:
